title: Yuusha ni Narenakatta Ore wa Shibushibu Shuushoku wo Ketsui Shimashita. OVA
original_name: 勇者になれなかった俺はしぶしぶ就職を決意しました。OVA
opening_song: "Extra Revolution (エキストラレボリューション)" by KANBAN Musume (KANBAN 娘; Azusa Tadokoro, Maina Shimagata, Emi Nitta, Madoka Sowa, Natsumi Yamada, Kanae Iwasaki, & Kumi Takaragi)
sinopse:
Raul's sister has come all the way from Raul's home village to see her brother who has "become a hero." Raul and his fellow co-workers think its a better idea to trick his sister to thinking Raul is a real hero.

(Source: Wikipedia)
